title: Labour of Love
creator_credit: Imago, Pumpkin Films, Martyn Down and Harriet Clutterbuck
brief_description: Demonstrates the positive aspects of home childbirth following the experiences of several families. Interviews their midwives about the advantages of having a baby amongst family and friends in familiar surroundings.
creator_credit_for_label: Imago, Pumpkin Films, Martyn Down and Harriet Clutterbuck
